text:
What was my inspiration to have the idea of become a teacher? I'm going to tell you !
I want to be a teacher at the elementary school since many years. Maybe one of my teacher was a little bit an inspiration because she was so sweet and she always wanted to be sure that we understood all she said.
When I was younger, I played with my sister and my cousins at the teachers and  when we had to choose who was going to be the teacher the final answer was always me. My sister and my cousins always said that this job was made for me.
During my last year at college I had the opportunity to have an experience with children at elementary school. I was in a class with a real teacher and I help her to give the lesson. At the end of the week the children were happy to have me with them and the teacher said that I got my place in front of a class.
This summer I worked with children and when they asked me questions about something, no matter what, I always tried to gave them a correct answer. Without tell them that I want to be a teacher in my future life they told me that I should become a teacher.
I think an other reason that make me realize that I want to be a teacher is that in this job I can do many things that I love. For example, I can be with children and I think it's the most important thing. I love to be in contact with children because I feel very comfortable with them. I'm a little shy when I am with other person but when I stand up in front of thirty children, I talk and I don't have any stress to be judge or anything else so it's an other reason of my urge to become teacher.
Finally, I love to transmit my knowledge and I think it's the work that correspond the most to me to do that.
